main event: A bright circular object emitting a white light was sighted moving at high speed in northeasterly direction over Little Rock, Arkansas on August 7, 1952, and disappeared after approximately 30 seconds.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be traveling at 500 miles per hour at an altitude of approximately 500 feet.
Mr. Smith reported that the object made no sound during its sighting.
The case has been classified as an Unidentified Flying Object (UFO) and will be further investigated by Project Blue Book.
The report includes a claim of a bright, white light emitting from the object, which is a common feature in UFO sightings.
The sighting lasted for around 30 seconds before the object disappeared from view.
sighted object: bright circular object emitting white light
photographs: no, the report only mentions 1 photo but none is visible in the document
